column1: '''Lego The Lord of the Rings: The Video Game''' is a video game by [[Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment]] and Traveller's Tales. The game is based on [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)
column2: ''The Lord of the Rings'' (film series)]] and was released in 13 November 2012.<ref>{{webcite
column5: Official LEGO The Lord Of The Rings Facebook page
column8: accessed=16 July 2012}}</ref> It features the story lines of [[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
column9: The Fellowship of the Ring]], [[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
column10: The Two Towers]] and [[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
column11: The Return of the King]] but "reimagined with the humor and endless variety of LEGO play".<ref>{{webcite
